io.straas.android.sdk.messaging

Class ChatroomManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ChatroomManager

  • public class ChatroomManager
extends Object
    ChatroomManager is used to manage a chatroom or a message board.

    To construct a ChatroomManager, you have to call use initialize(io.straas.android.sdk.base.interfaces.OnResultListener<io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ChatroomManager, io.straas.android.sdk.base.credential.CredentialFailReason>) to get your result. This method will check your developer credential, if it succeed, you will get a ChatroomManager. Then, you can call connect(java.lang.String, io.straas.android.sdk.base.identity.Identity, boolean, io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.interfaces.EventListener) to connect to a chatroom and start using other methods to use the chatroom.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(OnResultListener<ChatroomManager,CredentialFailReason> callback)
        Constructs a ChatroomManager if you are a authorized developer. If check passes, developer will get a ChatroomManager. If not, developer will receive a CredentialFailReason.
        Parameters:
        callback - Receives the initialization result.

      • connect

        public void connect(@NonNull
                    String chatroomName,
                    @NonNull
                    Identity identity,
                    boolean autoCreate,
                    @NonNull
                    EventListener eventListener)
        Connects to a chatroom.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.IDLE.

        Parameters:
        chatroomName - Target chatroom name.
        identity - The user who connecting to a chatroom. see Identity. If Identity is a guest, this person will login as a guest named "Guest".
        autoCreate - Set this true if you want to create a chatroom with the chatroom name when target chatroom doesn't exist. This feature needs to be enabled by the server side. Please contact StraaS.io support for further information.
        eventListener - Listens result of connection and other events. See EventListener.

      • resetIdentity

        public boolean resetIdentity(Identity identity)
        Resets Identity. If you receive MessagingError.UNAUTHORIZED_ERROR when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED, it means the member token in Identity is expired or invalid. Then, you can use this method to put new Identity in. Notice that the new Identity and the old Identity have to represent the same person.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED.

        Parameters:
        identity - New identity.
        Returns:
        True if reset succeeds.

      • getMessages

        public void getMessages(int page,
                        int perPage,
                        @NonNull
                        OnResultListener<Message[],MessagingError> listener)
        Gets messages in this chatroom.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED.

        Parameters:
        page - Target page of messages. The newest message will be at page 1.
        perPage - Message count of per page. The max value is 100.
        listener - OnResultListener. Developer will receive messages if task succeeds. If not, developer will receive the MessagingError for failure reason.

      • getUsers

        public void getUsers(int page,
                     int perPage,
                     @NonNull
                     OnResultListener<User[],MessagingError> listener)
        Gets users in this chatroom.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED.

        Parameters:
        page - Target page of users. The minimum number is 1.
        perPage - User count of per page. The max value is 200.
        listener - OnResultListener. Developer will receive users if task succeeds. If not, developer will receive the MessagingError for fail reason.

      • getChatroomInfo

        public void getChatroomInfo(@NonNull
                            OnResultListener<ChatroomInfo,MessagingError> listener)
        Gets ChatroomInfo of current chatroom.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED.

        Parameters:
        listener - OnResultListener. Developer will receive ChatroomInfo if task succeeds. If not, developer will receive the MessagingError for fail reason.

      • updateNickname

        public void updateNickname(String name,
                           OnResultListener<Void,MessagingError> listener)
        Updates current user's nick name to server.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED and the current user is a guest.

        Parameters:
        name - New nick name.
        listener - OnResultListener. Developer will receive the MessagingError for fail reason if task fails.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(String message,
                        OnResultListener<Void,MessagingError> listener)
        Sends message to chatroom.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED.

        Parameters:
        message - Message.
        listener - OnResultListener. Developer will receive the MessagingError for fail reason if task fails.

      • getCurrentUser

        public User getCurrentUser()
        Returns current user.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED.

        Returns:
        Current user.

      • getUserCount

        public int getUserCount()
        Returns current user count in chatroom.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED.

        Returns:
        User count.

      • getChatMode

        public ChatMode getChatMode()
        Returns ChatMode of current chatroom.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED.

        Returns:
        ChatMode.

      • getSendMessageInterval

        public int getSendMessageInterval()
        Returns send message interval of current chatroom. This value means the cool-down time in second that user can send message.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED.

        Returns:
        Interval in second.

      • getChatroomState

        public ChatroomState getChatroomState()
        Returns current chatroom state.
        Returns:
        ChatroomState.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect from current server. After disconnection finishes, EventListener.onDisconnected() that was set in connect(java.lang.String, io.straas.android.sdk.base.identity.Identity, boolean, io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.interfaces.EventListener) will be invoked.

        This method should only be called when the chatroom state is ChatroomState.CONNECTED or ChatroomState.CONNECTING.
